summary: Emanuelle lives in London where almost everything in the realm of erotic is available. Her friend Kate becomes a nude revue show to help her husband pay the bills.
cast: Angie Quick|Julie Lee|John M. East|Kevin Fraser|Gavin Clare|Timothy Blackstone|Geraldine Hooper|Anita Desmarais|Georges Waser|Erika Lea|Kathy Green|Suzanne Richens|John Roach|Vicki Scott|Louise London|Natalie Newport|Linzi Drew|Maria Harper|Samantha Devonshire|Carla Lawrence|Ruth Chapman|Kalla Ryan|Marilyn|John-Cochran Patrick
title: Emmanuelle in Soho
